page.title: 04SHOPPING AND TRADE
page.content: The shops around Hawthorn are the main shops in the area.Lathams is a wool and material shop.Your Price is the main clothes shop for men,they sell suits and underwear.The Halifax is a building society where they sell insurance and give loans.The people at the Halifax are friendly to us when we go in. Hitchens sells mostly clothes very cheaply.They also sell kettles and frying pans and other electrical goods. (Robert McTaggart) Hilmans the bike shop at Thornbridge is a big,new shop and sells all sorts of bikes, materials and accessories.They sell clothes and helmets with padding. The shop does a good trade with the local people.The Cottage Stores is a good shop which sells a lot of things such as groceries and bread, which can be delivered to your home. (Brian Thomas)
